Summary: a very bright sphere in the sky low pulsating flashing
divs: sighting details i have seen many objects(u.f.o.)in the skies over n.d. in the past ten years. last one was was early this morning (midnight hour) 7\31\11 in the eastern sky. first noticed by my sister in the backseat about a mile away from our farm. stopping in the road to get a better look. noticing that it seemed to expell something from the bottom. another smaller sphere 2 or three times. this was a very bright sphere in the low in the sky. pulsating bright white light , growing dim then black (dark) then super bright. sphere seemed to move in all directions back forth up and down. there were at least 2 planes that were flying past very close to the sphere. i commented to my sister "do you think they see it too?" thinking they are in the sky and have a way better close up look? i got back in our car and we drove up to our farm. while my husband was taking in our groceries. my sister and i were watching for about an hour. mostly just filling out this report to ask did anyone else see what we were seeing this morning? did not loose sight , just went inside. i've seen many unexplainable things in the n.d. skies at night. last year(summer)i was looking out my back door , saw a small red sphere moving around a field in my back yard. no more than 150 yards away. all of my sightings are always at night. and in the summer\ but that red sphere was so close to my backyard and maybe six feet off the ground. the only sighting that ever spooked me good. this is the first time i have ever reported anything . just thinking people will not take it serious. i will start filming proof of what i have been seeing for the last ten years.
trends: There have been no other sightings in mott
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
